title: Federal Agents Charge Two with 2 Million NFT 'Rug Pull' Money Laundering Scheme
summary: HSI agents charged Devin Alan Rhoden and Berman Jerry Nowlin Jr. with conspiracy to commit wire fraud and money laundering through NFT schemes. The defendants used 'chain-hopping' techniques, transferring fraud proceeds from Solana to Ethereum blockchain to obfuscate illicit funds. This case represents federal recognition of NFTs as vehicles for money laundering and sophisticated crypto obfuscation techniques.
